# meraki_wireless_ssid_open_roaming (Data Source)

This data source can read the `Wireless SSID Open Roaming` configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "meraki_wireless_ssid_open_roaming" "example" {
  network_id = "L_123456"
  number     = "0"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `network_id` (String) Network ID
- `number` (String) Wireless SSID number

### Read-Only

- `enabled` (Boolean) If true, OpenRoaming is enabled on this SSID.
- `id` (String) The id of the object
- `tenant_id` (String) The OpenRoaming DNA Spaces tenant ID.
